*v0.1a* | [kitchensinkdesign design] | [http://code.google.com/p/lua-library-assessment/source/browse code] | [LuaStandardLibrary rationale]

=== coverage ===

  * base
    * serialization
  * support
    * getopt
    * logging
    * filesystem
    * date/time
    * ffi: luajit2 ffi, alien
    * data formats: xml, json, csv
    * compression: zlib, bz2
    * cryptography: md5, sha1, sha2, hmac, hash
    * databases: mysql, sqlite, firebird, postgres
    * threading: lanes, rings
    * internet formats: mime, http, url, base64
    * uuid
    * decimal
    * platforms: msvcrt, posix
  * data structures
    * set, list, tree, unorderedarray, unorderedarrayset, orderedset
  * algorithms
    * priority queue
  * SDLs
    * string patterns, eg. s:gmatch'(.-)\n'
    * string formatting, eg. 'answer: %d' % 42
    * string interpolation, eg. 'Hello, $user' % {user = 'Dave'}
    * type checking, eg. typecheck'string[,int[,int]]'(function(s,i,j) ... end)
    * string lambdas, eg. 'x,y: x/y,x%y'
    * getopt
    * extended regex
